name: Robo Sniper Target
description:
Enter the world of robot sniper games where we present you an unprecedented concept, fully trained real time sniper robots on verge to destroy the enemy army. This top notch introduction to robot games has pure essence of shooting games mania in it while the intelligent robot sniper mercilessly hit opponents which are attacking in order to conquer the compound. Use survival tactics against enemy threat, retaliate to invasion of these war robots and finish all these ruthless machines before they take over.

Features:
- Incredible 3d graphics and camera angles that syncs with the theme of shooting game.
- An absolute treat for the lovers of war games with nonstop fun comprising of 20 levels.
- High quality sound effects to give you a crunch of mountain sniper shooting.
- Easy on screen controls to target enemy from point blank.
